code: import{useContext}from'react';import{CartContext}from'../context/CartContext';import'../styles/History.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const History=()=>{const{orderHistory}=useContext(CartContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"history-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Hist\xF3rico de Pedidos"}),orderHistory.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Nenhum pedido realizado ainda."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"order-list",children:orderHistory.map(order=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"order",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"order-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Pedido #",order.id]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:order.date})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"order-items",children:order.items.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"order-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[item.name," x",item.quantity]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["R$ ",(item.price*item.quantity).toFixed(2)]})]},item.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"order-total",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:["Total: R$ ",order.total.toFixed(2)]})})]},order.id))})]});};export default History;
